title: Multiple Voices of Contemporary American Literature
description: In-depth study of American fiction, poetry, and drama written since 1956. How contemporary literature examines enduring American themes and breaks new ground with the inclusion of diverse voices. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for English majors. Fulfills GWR for students with junior standing (90 units). Crosslisted as ENGL/HNRSÂ 343.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C1
